author: Leonie Kijewski
title: Amnesty video shows 'extreme overcrowding' in Cambodia prison
description: Government spokesperson admits overcrowding in prisons as health experts urge precautions to stop spread of coronavirus.
content:
Amnesty International has shared a new video it received that claims to show extreme overcrowding and "inhumane conditions" in a Cambodian prison amid the coronavirus pandemic.
The video, released on Friday, shows at least 25 prisoners crammed into a small c… [+3528 chars]
